pages.text: The $(mob)Yaga Hog$() is an animal found in $(thing)Swamps$(). It wanders around and flees when attacked, leaving a cloud of $(thing)Poison$() behind. Its meat is a poor source of food.$(p)It can be bred with $(item)Bread$(), and the $(item)Dirt$() on its back can be brushed off with a $(item)Brush$(). When all $(item)Dirt$() has been removed, it will grow back after several minutes, sped up if it is standing in $(thing)Water$().
